challenge.title: nutritionfacts.org - Sci-Hub Offers the Quickest, Easiest, and Greatest Access to Science
challenge.description: NutritonFacts.org's article and accompanying videos Sci-Hub Offers the Quickest, Easiest, and Greatest Access to Science explores Sci-Hub and Library Genesis as a citizen science tool, opening access to science in societies and regions blocked by structural oppression from science as a movement.
challenge.instructions: Read Sci-Hub Offers the Quickest, Easiest, and Greatest Access to Science on NutritionFacts.org.
